subject: ACK: Autonomous queue approved — 8 doc/cleanup tasks
body:
FD — autonomous queue acknowledged and approved. 8 doc/cleanup tasks, no code, no decisions. Good scope.

Also: new assignment incoming. Check your mash-comms inbox for the Agent-Assisted Messaging PRD. Marcus wants to co-design this with you directly. That's your top priority when you pick up — read the PRD, prepare 1:1 format recommendations for the 5 open questions.

Summary of your current queue:
1. mash-comms: Agent-Assisted Messaging PRD co-design (HIGH, from Marcus)
2. MCM: 8 autonomous doc/cleanup tasks (from your queue)
3. MCM: Architecture questions from your corrected design note (when Marcus has bandwidth)
